quote:
TOP 20 Master's
Life Awakening Quotes

name: Socrates
quote: The unexamined life is not worth living.

name: Plato
quote: Wise men speak because they have something to say; fools because they have to say something.

name: Confucius
quote: The man who asks question is a fool for a minute, the man who does not ask is a fool for life.

name: Lao Tzu
quote: If you are depressed, you are living in the past. If you are anxious, you are living in future.If you are at peace, you are living in present.

name: Lord Jesus Christ
quote: A new command I give you: love one another. As I have loved you, so you must love one another.

name: Lord Gautam Buddha
quote: Hatred does not cease by hatred, but only by love; this is the eternal rule.

name: Osho Rajneesh
quote: Respect yourself, love yourself, because there has never been a person like you and there never will be again.

name: Saint Kabir
quote: The lord is in me, the lord is in every seed, put false pride away and seek the lord within.

name: Guru Nanak
quote: He who has no faith in himself can never have faith in god.

name: Bhagavan Mahavira
quote: Live and allow to live, hurt no one, life is dear to all living being.

name: Echkart Tolle
quote: Realize deeply that the present moment is all you have. Make the Now primary focus of your life.

name: Deepak Chopra
quote: You are a spiritual being having a human experience. You're not a human being having a spiritual experience.

name: Sri Sri Ravishankar
quote: Today is a gift from God-that is why it is called the present.

name: Jaggi Vasudev
quote: If you think you are big, you become small. If you know you are nothing, you become unlimited.

name: Paulo Cohelo
quote: The secret of life is to fall seven times and to get up eight times.

name: Rhonda Byrne
quote: You become what you think about most. But you also attract what you think about most.

name: Swami Vivekananda
quote: The reason for every misunderstanding is that we see the people as we are but not as they are.

name: Adyashanti
quote: The more in harmony you are with the flow of your existence, the more magical life becomes.

name: Lord Krishna
quote: Whatever happened, was good. What's happening, it's going well. Whatever will happen, will also be good. Do not worry for the future. Live in present.

name: Prophet Mohammad
quote: Speak a good word or remain silent.
